instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Filipino language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Ang Germany ay nahihirapan sa mataas na bilang ng mga walang trabaho sa nakalipas na mga taon at ang mga repormang ipinakilala ni Schroder ay pinuna sa pagiging neo-liberalistic ng unyon at maging miyembro ng kanyang sariling partido.
output: Germany has been struggling with high unemployment for several years and the reforms Schröder introduced were criticized as being neo-liberalistic by unions and also by members of his own party.

instruction: In this task, given a sentence in the Filipino language, your task is to convert it into the English language.
input: Noong Huwebes ika-22 ng Marso, 2005, Si Anna Ayala, ang babaeng taga Las Vegas, ay nagpahayag na nakita niya ang isang darili ng tao sa kaniyang mangkok ng chili sa restauran ng Wendy's na nasa 1405 Monterey Highway, timog bahagi ng bayan ng San Jose, Calfornia, na pagmamay-ari ng Jern Management na nakabase sa Fresno.
output: On Thursday the 22nd of March, 2005, Anna Ayala, a woman from Las Vegas, claimed to have found a human finger in her bowl of chili at a Wendy's restaurant located at 1405 Monterey Highway, just south of downtown San Jose, California, owned by Fresno-based Jern Management..
